snippet: A second-chance jumper by Javan Felix gave the Longhorns’ new coach, Shaka Smart, a victory over the No. 3 Tar Heels.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; University of Texas beats University of North Carolina, 84-82; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: A second-chance jumper by Javan Felix gave the Longhorns’ new coach, Shaka Smart, a victory over the No. 3 Tar Heels.

headline.print_headline: Longhorns Fell Tar Heels at the Buzzer
headline.main: Longhorns Fell Tar Heels at the Buzzer
